text: avaru ‘‘namagagi nim'ma devarannu prarthisi, a dana entahaddagirabeku embudannu namage vivarisalu heliri’’ endaru. Musa helidaru; ‘‘a dana heccu vayas'sadudagali, tira eleyadagali agirabaradu – adara naduvina, madhyama vayas'sinaddagirabekendu devaru heluttiddane. Innadaru nivu nimage adesisiddannu madibidi’’
